title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added new GitHub Actions workflow for readability analysis of Markdown files in PRs
Created new "How-tos" category for account and profile documentation
Restructured existing account/profile docs into new how-to guides
Added Copilot tutorial on creating diagrams with Mermaid
Updated Copilot model comparison table with new capabilities
Extended support window for GHES 3.14-3.17 due to performance concerns
Improved 2FA recovery flow documentation and email unlinking process
Added GraphQL schema updates for enterprise security contact field
Enhanced secret scanning with Akamai support and validity checks

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added new GitHub Actions workflow for readability analysis of Markdown files in PRs
- Created new "How-tos" category for account and profile documentation

- Added Copilot tutorial on creating diagrams with Mermaid
- Updated Copilot model comparison table with new capabilities
- Extended support window for GHES 3.14-3.17 due to performance concerns
- Improved 2FA recovery flow documentation and email unlinking process

- Enhanced secret scanning with Akamai support and validity checks
